title: Timpone del Ponto
description: The archaeological site of Timpone del Ponto in Lucania indicates occupation from the Bronze Age through to the the Hellenistic period. The built fortifications of the Hellenistic period command a narrow point of the Sinni river valley between the hills of Coppola and Colobraro.

properties.description: Coordinates as collected and reported by Myers. Dates after BAtlas.
properties.title: GPS Location of Timpone del Ponto
